title: Life Under 'The Islamic State': Order In The Shadow Of Terror
teaser: The Sunni extremist group that calls itself the Islamic State is solidifying its hold on the Iraqi city of Mosul. As it does so, the group is building a track record for how it actually governs. NPR's Leila Fadel offers a glimpse of what life is like under the group's rule.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
